quest_item2.name: Bloodied Doll
quest_item2.flavour_text: A small children's toy, caked in dried bloodstains. Gazing upon its beady eyes fills you with a sad nostalgia.

quest_item3.name: Scuffed Backpack
quest_item3.flavour_text: A backpack filled with stolen supplies and a map to what is presumably a hideout. Someone's going to get fired for this. Or shot at.

quest_item4.name: 'Cursed' Laptop
quest_item4.flavour_text: An old laptop found on a dead guy. Full of extremely cursed computer code. What even is a 'list comprehension'?
